anathema: Harm or neglect a child, separate families, use magic to corrupt dreams
edict: Aid childbirths, spread joy and celebration, protect sleeping creatures
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Bes (The Guardian Fool)](/Deities.aspx?ID=633)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries Web Supplement](/Sources.aspx?ID=237) pg. 6

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Other Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=2)

**Edicts** Aid childbirths, spread joy and celebration, protect sleeping creatures

**Anathema** Harm or neglect a child, separate families, use magic to corrupt dreams

**Area of Concern**
Households, luck, marriage, protection

**Pantheons**
[Fortune's Fate](/Deities.aspx?ID=378)

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Constitution or Charisma

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Sanctification** can choose holy

**Divine Skill** [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=45)

**Favored Weapon** [Mambele](/Weapons.aspx?ID=477)

**Domains** [Earth](/Domains.aspx?ID=73), [Family](/Domains.aspx?ID=74), [Luck](/Domains.aspx?ID=81), [Protection](/Domains.aspx?ID=90)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Healing](/Domains.aspx?ID=78)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Sleep](/Spells.aspx?ID=1675)

- **2nd**
[Laughing Fit](/Spells.aspx?ID=1583)

- **3rd**
[Enthrall](/Spells.aspx?ID=1516)

</column>
name: Bes (The Guardian Fool)
